name: Privacypolicy
tagline: Privacy Policy for RandDeveloper Android Apps
body: Free Mind Logic and G4 Bulls and Cows teach deductive reasoning. They collect no personal information whatsoever. Free Mind Logic is ad supported and the ads come Google AdMob. G4 Bulls and Cows is the inexpensive ad-free version of Free Mind Logic.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
